description.english: Have no Heroes in your town (you might want to make a new save for this achievement)

description.tchinese: 小鎮裡沒有勇者（建議新建另一個存檔完成此成就）

displayName.japanese: それはちょっとマズいだろ

description.tchinese: 被捕獲的哥布林被擊中 500 次

description.english: Birth a Hero who has fewer traits than both of the sacrificed Heroes

description.tchinese: 誕生的勇者基因數同時小於被獻祭的兩個勇者的基因數
